Description:
Roles & Responsibilities:Listening to what customers want and helping them find the perfect product for their needs.
Constantly building product knowledge and delivering this knowledge in engaging ways.
Setting up attractive product displays and promotional booths.
Following up with customers and providing guidance on product selection.
Meeting daily targets and submitting sales reports.
Keep a record of sales and restock the store accordingly Skills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners
Age Limit – 30 years
1+ Years as a Sales Promoter

Any Bachelor’s Degree
Excellent command of both written and spoken English
Experience in Sales of Mobile Phones
